title: Baby Carrier
description: three upper panels (1 long, 2 square) of geometric embroidery in orange, magenta and turquoise; two lower square panels with embroidered floral design on black field in the same colors; surrounded by crude machine applique in blue, red and light green; black border on three sides; back lining in tiger print, orange, black and white
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
